ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: Pretty incredible luck there. You should definitely do better than a few ancient coins. Message Board is a good idea. There s got to be some nice armour or
ygData.messageBody:
Pretty incredible luck there. You should definitely do better than a few
ancient coins. Message Board is a good idea. There's got to be some nice
armour or weapons they can trade you.

Btw, the only coin that I had trouble with was the Kaesora because of the
way the zone is built. Dalnir's is 2nd hardest but doable alone. Scorp one
is easy if you kill the PHs on the ramp.

Tzeetch

Tzeetch - it's the very simple, and very old, Scrap Metal quest located in
the bowels of Ak'Anon.
Sanfyrd Featherhead (formerly Sanfyrd ontop), will accept scrap metal (in
loads of 4 unstacked at a time), which he will give you coins (a few
silver or copper) and a random item recovered from the scrapyard, which is
usually a rusty weapon, small buckler or Gnomish GlowRod (light source for
off-hand).
I believe that either 1) there is an incredibly small chance for a really
nice item, or 2) it was a fluke. Either way, I just won the lottery as far
as I'm concerned...

Talies the Wanderer
